use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki

property.fopxsl:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<xsl:output method="xml"/>
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- Skip fo:table-and-caption because Fop won't render tables otherwise --> <xsl:template match="fo:table-and-caption"> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:template>
<!-- Ignore fo:table-caption because it is not supported --> <xsl:template match="fo:table-caption" />
<!-- Change the page dimensions to Letter --> <xsl:template match="fo:simple-page-master/@page-height"> <xsl:attribute name="page-height"> <xsl:value-of select="'11in'"/> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="fo:simple-page-master/@page-width"> <xsl:attribute name="page-width"> <xsl:value-of select="'8.5in'"/> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:template> <!-- Change the font to FreeSans --> <xsl:template match="fo:root/@font-family"> <xsl:attribute name="font-family"> <xsl:value-of select="'FreeSans'"/> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:template>
<!-- Change the header --> <xsl:template match="fo:static-content[@flow-name='page-header']"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:attribute name="precedence">true</xsl:attribute> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <fo:table margin-top="2em"><fo:table-body><fo:table-row><fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="leftl"> <fo:instream-foreign-object content-width="scale-to-fit" content-height="scale-to-fit" inline-progression-dimension.minimum="auto" inline-progression-dimension.maximum="100%" block-progression-dimension.minimum="auto" block-progression-dimension.maximum="700px"> <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" text-rendering="geometricPrecision" viewBox="-0.5 9.5 301 60" width="100" height="20"> </svg> </fo:instream-foreign-object> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell><fo:table-cell> <fo:block font-size="large" space-after="0.5in" space-after.conditionality="retain" text-align="right"><xsl:value-of select="//fo:block[@role='html:h1']"/></fo:block> </fo:table-cell></fo:table-row></fo:table-body></fo:table> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- Change the footer --> <xsl:template match="fo:static-content[@flow-name='page-footer']"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <fo:block font-size="small" space-after="0.5in" space-after.conditionality="retain" text-align="center">Page <fo:page-number/> of <fo:page-number-citation-last ref-id="x-page-sequence"/></fo:block> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- Ignore some elements --> <xsl:template match="fo:block[@id='document-actions']" /> <xsl:template match="fo:block[@role='html:h1']" />
<!-- Add an ID to the whole page sequence, to be able to get the total number of pages --> <xsl:template match="fo:page-sequence"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:attribute name="id"><xsl:text>x-page-sequence</xsl:text></xsl:attribute> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki
